collin.title: Algomask Facial
collin.summary: A perfect facial for dehydrated, sensitive and/or rosacea-prone skin.  The Algo Mask soothes, hydrates and gives instant radiance to the skin.

collin.title: Sea C Spa Facial
collin.summary: Intensive Vitamin C anti-aging treatment. Great for preventing and repairing sun damaged skin. Destroys free radicals and replicates elastin for firmer and younger looking skin.

collin.title: Hydro Lifting Facial
collin.summary: Formulated to deeply rehydrate, restore, lift and firm the skin for instant radiance and enhanced skin tone.

collin.title: Oxygen Facial
collin.summary: Formulated to clear skin congestion, control acne and revitalize fatigued, stressed and dulled skin.

collin.title: Collagen Facial
collin.summary: An intensive hydration formula proven to regenerate and reduce the appearance of fine lines. Corrective facial for everyone with mature skin type.

facial.title: LiWei's Harmony Facial
facial.summary: A unique revitalizing facial regime that eliminates daily stress. Tension and fatigue from the face treatment includes gentle cleansing, enzyme peel and detoxifying steam. Luxurious massage techniques intensify the customized creams and serums. Eyes are revived with a firming mask. Individual skin type is determined and treated with a custom-blended mask.  The complexion is left  refreshed. Radiant and glowing.

facial.title: Orient Facial
facial.summary: The most common areas for treatment are the yang areas of the body such as the back, neck, shoulders, buttocks, limbs. Occasionally the chest and abdomen are used as well.

facial.title: Live Cell Facial
facial.summary: Strengthens skin cells, prolongs cellular lifespan and helps repairs UV-related skin damage. Reduces the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines and sagging skin.

facial.title: Botanical Facial
facial.summary: An anti-aging treatment for stressed-out skin. Soy protein tightens and firms. Jojoba oil softens, orange blossom water soothes and refreshes, and hyaluronic acid improves elasticity and moisture levels in the skin.

facial.title: Aromatherapy Massage
facial.summary: Our Aromatherapy massage uses essential oils from plants which help lessen pain or irritation in the body. Soothe and heal your muscles with the expertise of our masseuses.

facial.title: Basic Facial
facial.summary: As the foundation of every facial we offer, our Basic facial is the classic approach in sustaining a clear and renewed complexion for all skin types. This treatment comprises of cleansing, exfoliating, steaming and a gentle extracting process for the skin as well as a mild high frequency treatment that helps thoroughly cleanse and remove bacteria from the skin. To conclude the refreshing journey, enjoy a cold mask specific to your skin type - hydrating, brightening, anti-wrinkle or oily skin - with a relaxing signature massage. It's the ideal go-to service for any individual to revive and cleanse one's skin.

facial.title: Microdermabrasion Skin Peel Facial
facial.summary: With the most recently updated and advanced diamond technology, the Microdermabrasion resurfacing facial primarily treats sun damage, acne scars, enlarged pores, unbalanced skin tone, wrinkles and skin pigmentation. Reveal your natural beauty hiding underneath your epidermal layers and let your skin have that youthful and vibrant complexion with this latest technology.

facial.title: Organic Facial
facial.summary: Our organic facial is made up of natural ingredients including a variety of edible nutrients that help maintain a healthy look for your skin. Certain ingredients include avocado which is rich in vitamins and helps reduce wrinkles, green tea and tea tree which both contain several antioxidants that helps treat acne, jojoba which hydrates and rejuvenates the skin. With organic seaweed mask, your skin will be kept looking healthy and radiant.

makeup.title: Embroidery
makeup.summary: Basic Semi-Permanent Eyebrow Hairstrokes with one or two dimensional looks.

makeup.title: 3D Microblading
makeup.summary: Combination of the shading and hair stroke technique, whereby strokes are made closer to one another creating a shaded dimensional appearance.

makeup.title: Powdered Fills
makeup.summary: Method involves the application of thousands of tiny little dots of pigment, inserted into the skin, gradually building up a colour and a de ned shape.

makeup.title: Lip's Lines only
makeup.summary: This method uses different shades of color to blend the lip line to complement the natural color, the treatment which is to last 8-10 years, will give you a new fuller lips with no injections necessary.

makeup.title: Full Lips Pigmentation
makeup.summary: This method not only give you fuller lips through lip line tattoo, but also  lled in the lips with di erent shades of color to give you the appearances of a fuller full lips.

makeup.title: Eyeliner Permanent Makeup
makeup.summary: Permanent eyeliner or eyelash enahnces the appearance of the eyes.  The price is for either upper or lower eyeliners.

makeup.title: Retouch Services
makeup.summary: For ALL Permanent Makeup retouch services.

spa.title: Black / White Doll Facial
spa.summary: It is one of the most advanced treatments for minor skin imperfections and promotes a smooth and glowing complexion.  e Carbon Laser Peel Treatment helps reduce  ne lines and wrinkles including ‘crow’s feet’.  The process is non invasive and pain free.

spa.title: LED Light Therapy
spa.summary: LED works by penetrating into the dermis layer of the skin, energizing the cells that are responsible for reproducing collagen & melanin, helping to reverse the signs of aging, giving you a smoother & more even skin tone.

spa.title: Hydro Dermabrasion
spa.summary: It is the latest renovation in skincare technology. Utilising water jets, the outer layer of the skin will be broken up.  This will reveal a smoother, more even texture of the skin.

spa.title: Hyperbaric Oxygen Treatment
spa.summary: Promotes natural collagen and elastin production improving skin texture, visibly smoothing fine lines and wrinkles.

spa.title: Dermapen Micro-needling Treatment
spa.summary: Is a minimally invasive technique that boosts your skin's production of collage and elastin, two of the most important substances in maintaining plump, youthful, glowing skin.

spa.title: RF Body Contouring
spa.summary: Non-invasive body-contouring treatments powered by radiofrequency (RF), to reducing skin laxity (looseness) to improve the appearance of excess or sagging skin.

spa.title: Ultrasonic Cavitation Treatment
spa.summary: Noninvasive ultrasonic-cavitation treatments are designed to contour the body and reduce fat.  The energy works to liquefy fat cells for natural disposal by the body.

packages.title: LiWei Package
packages.summary: For a limited time choose 5 unique treatments (treatments cannot repeat) from the spa treatments section for only $399.
